text:
CBS LABORATORIES
A Division of Columbia Broadcasting System, Inc.
HIGH RIDGE ROAD, STAMFORD, CONNECTICUT *(203) 325-4321
JOSEF C. DINE
Director of Information Services
December 30, 1965
Miss Mary Lynn Moody
NAEB
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Miss Moody:
Thank you for your December 7 letter, and the pamphlets. We
are looking forward to joining the NAEB as soon as the spinoff
of educational television product from our government-industry -
CBS work reaches the proper point. This may well be next year
and you will hear from me at the appropriate time.
JD:md
